question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letterexplain why you want to work in the company's head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his help arranging it
text: I am writing to you to express my interest in working at the Head office in Sydney, for the next six months.

With the current transition and internal changes happening in our company, we have recently been notified with an update that there is a temporary opening for the post of Team Leader in Australia. Since it has been four years, that I am rooted as an Assistant Team Leader, it is my belief that this job role suites me best, due to my experiences gained here. Moreover, due to our daily communication, I am well-aware of their processes of working and a quick training may be sufficient.

During my absence, this role can be handed over to senior Avinash, who has been assisting me in all my reporting and his role given to the next person in line. In the event the temporary job closes off, I am willing to continue work here in the old position.
It would be great if you could discuss this arrangement with the Human Resources and Managerial teams, along with your recommendations.
Hoping that you would consider my request,
